meanings.sent1: She hierarchized the toys by size, putting the biggest on top.
meanings.sent2: The teacher hierarchized the students based on their test scores.
meanings.sent3: The ants hierarchized the food in the colony, with the sweetest treats on top.
meanings.sent4: The CEO hierarchized the company structure, placing the executives at the highest level.
meanings.sent5: The librarian hierarchized the books on the shelves, with the most popular ones at eye level.

meanings.definition: To classify or organize according to rank or importance.
meanings.sent1: He hierarchized his priorities, putting family above work.
meanings.sent2: The chef hierarchized the ingredients based on freshness.
meanings.sent3: The cat hierarchized its toys, always choosing the mouse over the ball.
meanings.sent4: The coach hierarchized the team members, with the captain at the top.
meanings.sent5: The gardener hierarchized the plants, placing the sun-loving ones in the front row.
